LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Basic Biology
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Knowledge of how to effectively care for a variety of plant or animal life.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Not quite as invovled as biology, but represents the care and understanding of plants and animals. Could be used for seed harvesting, creating hybrids, applying fertilizer, other gardening activities or tending to animals, knowing their habits as well as likes and dislikes.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Forestry
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding the techniques for efficient wood chopping, lumberjacking, cultivation, management and study of trees as well as treatment methods and wood uses.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: While a simple task, it often takes practice to perfect the skill of a lumberjack as well as treatment methods and wood uses.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Ecology
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding of the ecosystem focusing on Animals and how they interact with the environment around them.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Understanding the techniques for efficient gathering and knowledge of animals for the best harvest, reducing waste and effecting speed and how to handle them, not only being familular with their physical anatomy, but their behaviour.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Cultivation
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding how to sow or plant crops as well as work with the ground and soil, including their properties and effects.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: This is a must for farmers. It includes knowing how to look after plants, their effects when near others or consumed, their life cycle, how they react to certain environments and their nutrition.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Fertilization
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding how to make and use fertiliser for crops as well effects of decomposition and anything that helps boost plant growth.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Understanding of things that act as fertiliser for plants and how to keep it balanced for the best growth as well as decomposition techniques, the effects of it and uses.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: First Aid
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: The understanding and ability to render basic life-saving medical treatment.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Ability to close and care for minor flesh wounds. Most industrial soldiers will have this. Tribal doctors or medieval "quack" doctors might have this in liue of actual medical expertise. Does not represent the ability to do open surgeries, body modification, install complex prosthetics, etc. Not usually used for non-job lockouts.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Advanced First Aid
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: The understanding and ability to render advanced life-saving medical treatment.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Ability to close and care for major flesh wounds. May know how to suture wounds or amputate safely. Most industrial soldiers will have this. Tribal doctors or medieval "quack" doctors might have this in liue of actual medical expertise. Does not represent the ability to do open surgeries, body modification, install complex prosthetics, etc. Not usually used for non-job lockouts.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Medical
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Deep understanding of anatomy and medical techniques. The ability to perform a variety of surgeries and medical treatments.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Generally represents the capabilities of a modern surgeon. Can be used with Electronics for very simple bionics installs. Required for all spinal and brain surgeries. Not often used for recipe or construction lockouts. Used for research lockouts that involve unlocking new surgeries or "cure X" recipes. Most insutrial doctors and surgeons will have this. Industrial field medics will have this. Should be extremely rare pre-industrial.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Transplant Surgery
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Organ transplantation is a medical procedure in which an organ is removed from one body and placed in the body of a recipient.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Generally anything revolving any replacing inner organs.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Trauma Surgery
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding of surgical critical care and acute care surgery.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Operations that require emergency treatment and are ciritcal. Failure is not an option.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Plastic Surgery
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding of surgical specialty involving the restoration, reconstruction or alteration of the human body.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Reconstructive surgery and cosmetic surgery. Heal scars or purposefully changing the body to suit your needs. Mainly Cosmetic.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: General Surgery
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding of common surgical procedures that arent life threatening.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: General surgery is a surgical specialty that focuses on alimentary canal and abdominal contents including the esophagus, stomach, small intestine, large intestine, liver, pancreas, gallbladder, appendix and bile ducts, and often the thyroid gland.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Orthopedics
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding of the conditions involving the musculoskeletal system.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Understanding of how to use both surgical and nonsurgical means to treat musculoskeletal trauma, spine diseases, sports injuries, degenerative diseases, infections, tumors, and congenital disorders.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Neurosurgery
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding of Neurosurgery, known in common parlance as brain surgery.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Understanding of the surgical treatment of disorders which affect any portion of the nervous system including the brain, spinal cord and peripheral nervous system.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.label: Cardiothoracic Surgery
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.description: Understanding of surgical treatment of organs inside the thoracic cavity.
LifeLessons.ProficiencyDef.assignmentTips: Understanding of treatment of conditions of the heart, lungs, and other pleural or mediastinal structures.
